entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain before morning. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
